fees.waiverText: Annual fee waived on spends of ₹1,00,000 or more in an anniversary year

benefits.description: 5% cashback on select online merchants including Amazon, Flipkart, Myntra, Swiggy, Zomato, Uber and others
1% fuel surcharge waiver on eligible fuel transactions

milestones.declaredReward: Gift voucher worth ₹1,000 or one domestic lounge visit

declaredWelcomeBenefits.description: 1,000 cashback points awarded on payment of joining or renewal fee

declaredConstraints.description: 5% cashback capped at 1,000 cashback points per statement cycle
1% cashback capped at 1,000 cashback points per statement cycle
Cashback is not applicable on fuel, rent, government transactions and certain wallet loads
Domestic lounge access subject to minimum spend criteria as defined by the issuer
Fuel surcharge waiver applicable on fuel spends between ₹400 and ₹5,000, capped at ₹250 per statement cycle
CashPoints redeemed against statement credit have a value of ₹1 per point; travel redemptions via SmartBuy may have different value

declaredEligibility.description: Salaried applicants: minimum net monthly income of ₹35,000; age between 21 and 40 years
Self-employed applicants: minimum annual ITR of ₹6,00,000; age between 21 and 40 years

sourceRef: HDFC Millennia Credit Card product page
